subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: For the second day in a row, the Mets played a 14-inning game, but on Saturday they pulled out a victory over the Phillies, with David Wright singling in the decisive run.
snippet: For the second day in a row, the Mets played a 14-inning game, but on Saturday they pulled out a victory over the Phillies, with David Wright singling in the decisive run.
